mapper.update: update dcdg_business_settlement_info set MONEY = #{money,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, MONEY_TYPE = #{moneyType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, SHOP_ID = #{shopId,jdbcType=CHAR}, SETTLEMENT_TYPE = #{settlementType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, SETTLEMENT_STATUS = #{settlementStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, SHOP_NAME = #{shopName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADD_TIME = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IN_SETTLEMENT_TIME = #{inSettlementTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OUT_SETTLEMENT_TIME = #{outSettlementTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, BANK_CARD_ID = #{bankCardId,jdbcType=CHAR}, ALL_ORDER_ID = #{allOrderId,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SETTLE_ID = #{settleId,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select SETTLE_ID, MONEY, MONEY_TYPE, SHOP_ID, SETTLEMENT_TYPE, SETTLEMENT_STATUS, SHOP_NAME, ADD_TIME, IN_SETTLEMENT_TIME, OUT_SETTLEMENT_TIME, BANK_CARD_ID, ALL_ORDER_ID from dcdg_business_settlement_info where SETTLE_ID = #{settleId,jdbcType=CHAR}

select SETTLE_ID, MONEY, MONEY_TYPE, SHOP_ID, SETTLEMENT_TYPE, SETTLEMENT_STATUS, SHOP_NAME, ADD_TIME, IN_SETTLEMENT_TIME, OUT_SETTLEMENT_TIME, BANK_CARD_ID, ALL_ORDER_ID from dcdg_business_settlement_info

select a.SETTLE_ID ,a.MONEY ,a.MONEY_TYPE ,a.IN_SETTLEMENT_TIME ,a.OUT_SETTLEMENT_TIME ,a.SETTLEMENT_STATUS ,a.SETTLEMENT_TYPE ,b.ACCOUNT_NUMBER ,c.`BANK_ICO` ,c.`BANK_NAME`
from dcdg_business_settlement_info a left join dcdg_customer_account_base b on a.BANK_CARD_ID=b.ACCOUNT_ID left join dcdg_basic_bank_base c on b.BANK_TYPE_ID=c.BANK_ID where a.SHOP_ID = #{shopId,jdbcType=CHAR} and a.SETTLE_ID = #{settleId,jdbcType=CHAR}
select min(IN_SETTLEMENT_TIME) from dcdg_business_settlement_info where SHOP_ID = #{shopId,jdbcType=CHAR}
